main event: On 23 November 1948, USAF Captain observed an unidentified object moving in the air with speeds estimated between 200 to 500 MPH near Furstenfeldbruck, Germany.
interesting points: The object was sighted at 27,000 feet and later reported to be circling at 10,000 feet,The object appeared to be like a reddish star moving in a westerly direction,The object had an estimated speed between 200 and 500 MPH,The sighting lasted long enough for the captain to alert Base Operations,The captain's reliability was affirmed as he was an experienced F-80 pilot.
sighted object: unidentified object appearing like a reddish star
